alert.note: Alert for City of Fredericksburg; King George; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:26PM EDT until July 29 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Stafford County in northern Virginia... South central King George County in central Virginia... The southwestern City of Fredericksburg in central Virginia... East central Spotsylvania County in central Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 525 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Massaponax, or near Fredericksburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Massaponax, Spotsylvania and Thornburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Fredericksburg; King George; Spotsylvania; Stafford
